name: The 25th Ward: The Silver Case - DLC Bundle
name_original: The 25th Ward: The Silver Case - DLC Bundle
description:
The 25th Ward: The Silver Case - DLC Bundle includes:
- 25th Ward: The Silver Case - Digital Art Book
- 25th Ward: The Silver Case - Digital Soundtrack



The 25th Ward: The Silver Case Digital Art Book includes 34 pages of full-color art, descriptions of characters, and the descriptions of the three main story arcs: Correctness, Matchmaker, and Placebo.

The 25th Ward: The Silver Case Digital Soundtrack includes 32 tracks!

Track list:
  1. Metropolitan Edge (Composer: Akira Yamaoka)
  2. Galaxy Glitch Groove (Composer: Akira Yamaoka)
  3. Digging (Composer: Akira Yamaoka)
  4. Investigation, 25th Style (Composer: Akira Yamaoka)
  5. Crime Lounge (Composer: Akira Yamaoka)
  6. Finding My Way (Composer: Akira Yamaoka)
  7. Adjustment (Composer: Akira Yamaoka)
  8. Conspiracy (Composer: Akira Yamaoka)
  9. De/crypt (Composer: Akira Yamaoka)
  10. Criminal Power (Composer: Akira Yamaoka)
  11. I'm a Detective (Composer: Akira Yamaoka)
  12. Lavender peppermint (Composer: Baiyon)
  13. Citrus Verbena (Composer: Baiyon)
  14. Bergamote (Composer: Baiyon)
  15. Sandalwood (Composer: Baiyon)
  16. Kakadu Plum (Composer: Baiyon)
  17. ZERO (Composer: Erika Ito)
  18. DRIFT (Composer: Erika Ito)
  19. EVEN (Composer: Erika Ito)
  20. GRAVE (Composer: Erika Ito)
  21. HAZE (Composer: Erika Ito)
  22. LONE (Composer: Erika Ito)
  23. MURMUR (Composer: Erika Ito)
  24. ORACLE (Composer: Erika Ito)

  32. Silver2018 TKD Remix (Remixed by Masafumi Takada)
